title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Zugerberg Mountain, Switzerland
content:
Photo submitted by Reto Wick, “I’m lucky I live close to Zugerberg, a hill next to Zug, Switzerland. We got married up there last year, and as you can see, it’s a stunning view, perfect for my evening rides.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Zugerberg Mountain, Switzerland appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
